experiments.name: Game V1.1 - Enhanced Unit Stats System
experiments.description: Implementing comprehensive unit statistics system including combat stats, critical system, effect system, healing, energy, and damage modifiers

experiments.name: Game V1.2 - Implement terrain and movement cost System
experiments.description: Adding terrain types with different movement costs, affecting unit mobility and tactical positioning. Includes basic terrains (plains, forest, mountains) and their impact on movement points.
